articles.title: Why car insurance costs have soared (and what drivers are doing about it) - NPR
articles.description: Car insurance premiums have increased at twice the rate of overall inflation. They've stabilized, at least for now, but more than half of Americans say the costs are painful.
articles.content: NPR's series Cost of Living: The Price We Pay is examining what's driving price increases and how people are coping after years of stubborn inflation. How are higher prices changing the way you live?… [+7292 chars]

articles.title: Certain species of bats can glow under UV light. Scientists don’t know why - CNN
articles.description: Six species of North American bats glow under ultraviolet lighting, according to a new study. Researchers don’t know why certain mammals exhibit this odd trait.
articles.content:
Glowing bats may sound like Halloween decor, but researchers in Georgia have discovered certain species of North American bats that are capable of the unusual trick.

articles.title: Obesity rate is declining as more Americans use weight loss drugs, survey finds - CBS News
